author: coke
title: Capitalism!
text: Quote: Originally Posted by coke If your point was me saying socialist, then you should play catch up. The democrat party is the party of Socialism. Bernie Sanders ring a bell? Debbie Wasserman Schultz Again Won't Explain Difference Between Democrats and Socialists | Video | RealClearPolitics Furthermore if you want to play neutral in the middle and just slam everyone, just keep something in mind. Walking in the middle is great. Until something comes along and runs you over. I don't care what the democratic party says. Neither being pro or anti gun is a tenant of socialism, so saying socialists is unfair. If you want to talk about that specific set of bullshit pseudosocialists, just call them democrats. It's what they are, aren't they? Also, I'm not a middleman. I thought it was obvious from the fact that there are times when libs mistake me for a con and cons mistake me for a lib that I am neither of those two things. Last edited by Beasty; October 8th, 2015 at 10:34 PM .
